name: m2c2kit
description: A library for cross-platform cognitive assessments

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/build-helpers" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/core" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/cli" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/schematics" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/schema-util" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/session" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/addons" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/physics" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/survey" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/schematics" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/db" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/embedding" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/sage-research" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-grid-memory" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-symbol-search" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-color-dots" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-color-shapes" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-cli-starter" && concurrently "npm run build-webview -w @m2c2kit/assessments-demo" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessments-demo" "npm run copy-modules"
scripts.integration-test: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up --exit-code-from m2c2kit
